componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: NOTE: You have set the "Add. Funding Required for Exit" field to "Yes", which means that the Project must go through approval. Please set all the Approvers in the "Validations" tab and then change the Status to "Exit Submitted".

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: NOTE: You have set the "Add. Funding Required for Exit" field to "No", which means that you can change the Project Status directly to "Exit in Progress".

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Note: To submit your Project for approval, please ensure the Project Status is set to one of these values:

  • Idea Submitted
  • Concept Submitted
  • Exit Submitted

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: link to the lifecycle chart in the Knowledge Base

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Multi-stage applications: Some external donors require multistage applications. This means that the application process has multiple stages included. First the Concept Note is evaluated. Only applicants that passed initial selection are invited to submit the full application at a later stage. Contact your IPD contact person for more information.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Note: These figures depict the financials as in the application and in the contract. These figures are captured solely for global reporting on IPD performance and are not synchronised to D365.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: The Agreements tab is only relevant for IPD grants that are funding Global Emergency Response Humanitarian Appeal or Project. Please contact IO IPD or your GER representative in case of doubt. Additional information is available in the Knowledge Base.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Warning: It looks like the Programme Location field has been populated, but there are no P&PU records in the "Setup" tab. Please try the following:


  1. Delete the value in the Programme Location field & click Save.
  2. Add the value back to the Programme Location & click Save
  3. There should be 1 P&PU record now listed in the Setup tab.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Tip: To add PUs to your project, use the "Add PU" button at the top of the page

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Tip: To add Team Members to your Project, use the Add Team Member button at the top of the page. Be sure that the project has a External project team assigned, if not can throw an error. Contact your System administrator in case of error.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please note that the submit button is no longer available for 2023. Your data will be saved automatically

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: ATTENTION: If values for X-axis and Y-axis are exactly the same for Risk records associated with this project, the values will overlap in the Scatter Plot below. The result is the display of only one value.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Project's Idea has been validated! Once you know there is interest to fund, please manually update the actionable field "Interest to Fund" and associated date so that it can progress to Formulation.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Project's Concept Note has been validated! Once you know funding has been approved, please update the actionable field "Funding Approved" and associated date so that it can progress to Implementation. If no funding was required, please update Project Status directly to In Implementation.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Project's Exit Strategy has been validated! Once you know additional international funding for exit has been approved, please update the actionable field "Exit Funding Approved" and associated date so that it can progress to Closure.
